mapper.select: select bsmno, pass, bnum, type, company, email, ceo, phone, field, addr, logo, reg_date, up_date, del_date, del_yn from biz where bsmno=#{bsmno} and pass=#{pass} and del_yn='N'

select bsmno from biz where company=#{company} and phone=#{phone} and email=#{email} and del_yn='N'
